'''0.9''' is a [[launcher]] version released on June 10, 2013.

== Additions ==
* Now includes a Profile Editor tab. 
** Choosing the game's version can only be done when the player double clicks their profile and changes the version in the drop down list.

== Changes ==
* Changes to the Version Selector area.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCL-87}} – Version selection doesn't persist between launches
